bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2002. Avec résumé en arabe.
bibl.note: D.A.I. Excavations, May 20 to June 22, 2002. - 1. The apartment house in the north-west of the North Bath. - 2. The house with the portico beside the North Bath. - 3. The wall paintings in the house with the portico. - 4. Activities in the northern court of the Eastern Church.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter and Iasmin PFEIFFER, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2002. Avec résumé en arabe.

D.A.I. Excavations, May 20 to June 22, 2002. - 1. The apartment house in the north-west of the North Bath. - 2. The house with the portico beside the North Bath. - 3. The wall paintings in the house with the portico. - 4. Activities in the northern court of the Eastern Church.
